cleverness; deftness; dexterity; ingenuity.
pleasantness; agreeableness.
relating to the four objects of human pursuit - righteousness, wealth, mundane pleasure, and the final beatitude.
the aggregate of four objects of human pursuit - righteousness, wealth, mundane pleasure, and the final beatitude.
(pl.) the four broad divisions of Hindu society based on their pursuits- they being brāmhaṇa, kṣatriya, vaiśya and śudra.
= ಚಾತುರ್ವರ್ಣ.
a pupil or follower of any teacher; a disciple.
= ಚಾತಕ.
a large, rectangular piece of cotton, linen, silk, etc., used on a bed or as a wrapper over the body; a sheet; bedspread.
an oblong cloth, interlaced with silk threads, worn as a covering for the head or shoulders; a shawl.
= ಚಾದರ.
= ಚಾದರ.
a tea pot.
the number, quantity by which another number (the multiplicand) or quantity is or is to be multiplied; the multiplier.
= ಚಾಣ.
a man versed with Vēdas.
a dull, ignorant man; a dunce; a stupid.
the quality or condition of being negligent; habitual failure to do the required thing; carelessness; negligence.
want of quickness, swiftness; slothfulness; slowness.
a flexible strip of wood or other material, bent by a string stretched between its ends, for shooting arrows; a bow.
a part of the circumference of a circle; an arc.
a bow or arc of prismatic colours appearing in the heavens opposite the sun and caused by the refraction and reflection of the sun's rays in drops of rain.
the ninth sign of the zodiac; the Sagittarius.
(astrol.) a condition in which the positions of the nine planets are distributed in all the seven houses from the tenth to fourth houses of the zodiac.
(rhet.) a kind of tricky composition.
a kind of animal the skin of which is processed and used in making percussion instruments.
a gem that is flat.
= ಚಾಪಟೆಯ.
a man who commits or is habitually inclined to, adultery.
a morally bad or wicked man.
the tendency or inclination of a man to have sexual relation with a woman not his wife.
= ಚಾಪವೇದ.
(astrol.) a condition in which the positions of the nine planets are distributed in all the seven houses from the tenth to fourth houses of the zodiac.
in coconut palm, a net-like fibrous material found at the point where the thick, hard, central part of a leaf is joined to the main stem.
moving to and fro; trembling; wavering; unsteady.
infirm in deciding or forming opinion; erratic in habits, purpose or behaviour.
lasting but a moment; very brief; fleeting.
the quality or fact of being unsteady, wavering; unsteadiness.
inability to take a firm decision, forming opinion.
the quality of being erratic in habits, purpose or behaviour.
quickness in moving, going, travelling, proceeding or performing; swiftness; speed; celerity.
the fact or habit of acting or tending to act too hastily or without due consideration.
the dexterity in archery.
= ಚಾಪಲ2 - 1, 2 & 3; 4. an irrepressible desire.
= ಚಾಪವೇದ.
the science, technique and art of shooting with bow and arrow; archery.
= ಚಾಪಲ1.
= ಚಾಪಲ2.
a person not firm, resolute in mind or purpose; a person having vacillating mind.
level, even or without unevenness of surface, as land or tabletops; having a surface that is without marked projections or depressions.
a woman not firm, resolute in mind or purpose; a woman having vacillating mind.
= ಚಾಪವೇದ.
a man very skilled and able in the science and art of archery.
= ಚಾಪಾಗಮಜ್ಞ.

to produce (a text, picture, etc.) by applying inked types, plates, blocks or the like, to paper or other material either by direct pressure or indirectly by offsetting an impression or image onto an intermediate roller; to print.
the space, amount or degree to which a thing extends; extent.
a small, flat piece of stone, used in games by children.
a relatively longer step or stride.
the act of leaping; a jumping.
a unit of linear measure, equal to the length of a relatively longer step or stride of a person (this unit is subjective and not a standard one).
the pushing of a marble, in a children's play, with the back of the palm with fingers bent.
in firearms, a small lever pressed back by the finger to activate the firing mechanism; the trigger of a gun.
(mus.) rhythmic stress or beat, in playing percussion instruments.
any of the two types of rhythmic scale having five or seven units in each cycle.
ಚಾಪು ಹಾಕು cāpu hāku (mus.) to play a percussion instrument with a particular rhythmic stress or beat.
a bundle of stalk left in fields after cutting the crops.
a long, flat stone.
a long stride or step, in walking.
a flat, coarse fabric made of woven or plaited hemp, straw, rope, etc., used to sit on and occasionally as a screen.
ಚಾಪೆ ಹಾಕು cāpe hāku (fig.) to be courteous or give a warm welcome to a guest. 2. (fig.) to treat a person more preferentially (with favourable bias).
(fig.) to become too sick and be abed.
one of the gaits of a horse.
a well trained rider of a horse; a jockey.
an instrument for striking or flogging, consisting generally of a stiff or flexible rod with a lash attached to one end; a whip.
(fig.) the quality of acting or reacting very quickly or responding reflexively with caution.
Křṣṇa, whose body is black in colour.
a fan made of the long hair of yak (Bos grunniens).
(fig.) a sweeping broom.

ಚಾಮರವನಿಡು cāmaravaniḍu = ಚಾಮರವಿಕ್ಕು; ಚಾಮರಸೇವೆ cāmara sēve (in temples) a moving or agitating the air with a fan, a service to the God; 2. (fig.) to beat with a broom; ಚಾಮರಹಾಕು cāmara hāku = ಚಾಮರವಿಕ್ಕು.
a female servant in a royal court, whose work is to fan the king or queen.
= ಚಾಮರಗ್ರಾಹಿಣಿ.
